page.title: 08POPULATION 1
page.content:
{POPULATION,}their work and homes
We obtained the results of this survey by visiting{140}households within our selected area.Out of these {140}households there were{478}people living there.{264}of these people were male and{214}were female.
{Age Groups
We had{9}age groups ranging from{0-4 to{65+}in years.The largest group of people were parents aged between{30-44 years although there were quite a lot of parents in the{25-29}age group. The majority of children were between{5-19}years old.There were few children under the age of{5}years, which shows that there is a small decline in birth rate in this area.
